overview: This official Home Video contains eyeshattering excerpts from the first two "never before seen" videos: "Take Me To the Top" and "Public Enemy Number One" plus 25 uncensored minutes behind the scenes with the Crue. Plus: Livewire, Looks That Kill, Too Young to Fall in Love, Smokin' in the Boys Room, and Home Sweet Home.
title: Mötley Crüe: Uncensored
